synopsis.text:
Yuuki Sora, a 14-year-old middle school student, has been living in a world dominated by networks since her birth in 2024. Despite her friends' enthusiasm for the popular online game, 'The World', Sora shows little interest in gaming. However, after persistent persuasion, she decides to give it a try, discovering an unexpected enjoyment in the virtual realm.

Sora's life takes an unexpected turn when she encounters a peculiar incident within the game. A mysterious girl hands her a small cube during an attack by an enigmatic entity, leading to strange occurrences in the real world. News begins to circulate about players losing consciousness while playing 'The World', and Sora finds herself at the epicenter of these inexplicable events.

As the boundaries between the virtual and real world begin to blur, Sora must navigate the challenges presented by the game and unravel the mystery behind the anomalies. Will she be able to restore normalcy, or will she be consumed by the digital world she has come to love? Join Sora on her thrilling journey in 'The World' to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
